LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.Plugins.SalesForce.Admin.Menu.MenuName
LocaleResource.Value: Sales Force

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.Submenus.Settings
LocaleResource.Value: Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.NopSalesForce
LocaleResource.Value: Nop Sales Force

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings
LocaleResource.Value: Sales Force Settings

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.EnableNopSalesForce
LocaleResource.Value: Enable Nop Sales Force

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.EnableNopSalesForce.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Enables Nop Sales Force.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.MachineName
LocaleResource.Value: Machine Name

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.MachineName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Machine Name

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfCustomersToProcessInOneRun
LocaleResource.Value: Number of Customers To Process In One Run

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfCustomersToProcessInOneRun.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of customers to process in one run. The NopSalesForce plugin runs a scheduled task to process products, customers and orders. The number of customers to process should be limited as there is a limit to the Sales Force soap service calls, which varies with the Sales Force organization licenses and Sales Force edition.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfLicensesToProcessInOneRun
LocaleResource.Value: Number of Licenses To Process In One Run

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfLicensesToProcessInOneRun.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of licenses to process in one run. The NopSalesForce plugin runs a scheduled task to process products, customers, orders, shopping carts and licenses. The number of licenses to process should be limited as there is a limit to the Sales Force soap service calls, which varies with the Sales Force organization licenses and Sales Force edition.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfOrdersToProcessInOneRun
LocaleResource.Value: Number of Orders To Process In One Run

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfOrdersToProcessInOneRun.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of orders to process in one run. The NopSalesForce plugin runs a scheduled task to process products, customers and orders. The number of orders to process should be limited as there is a limit to the Sales Force soap service calls, which varies with the Sales Force organization licenses and Sales Force edition.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfProductsToProcessInOneRun
LocaleResource.Value: Number of Products To Process In One Run

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.NumberOfProductsToProcessInOneRun.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The number of products to process in one run. The NopSalesForce plugin runs a scheduled task to process products, customers and orders. The number of products to process should be limited as there is a limit to the Sales Force soap service calls, which varies with the Sales Force organization licenses and Sales Force edition.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.Password
LocaleResource.Value: Password

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.Password.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The password for Sales Force.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.ProcessCustomersWithRegistrationOlderThanSpecifiedHour
LocaleResource.Value: Process customers with registration older than

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.ProcessCustomersWithRegistrationOlderThanSpecifiedHour.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies how old a customer registration should be so that the customer is processed by the Sales Force task. It is a good idea that customers are not processed immediately after their registration as it might take some time for the customer to activate their registration or place orders.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.ProcessOrdersOlderThanSpecifiedHour
LocaleResource.Value: Process orders older than

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.ProcessOrdersOlderThanSpecifiedHour.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies how old an order should be to be processed by the Sales Force task. It is a good idea that orders are not processed immediately as it might take some time for the order payment to go through after an order is placed.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SalesForceSoapServiceEndPoint
LocaleResource.Value: Sales Force Soap Service End Point

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SalesForceSoapServiceEndPoint.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The url for the Sales Force Soap Service.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SalesForceTaskRunPeriod
LocaleResource.Value: Sales Force Task Run Period

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SalesForceTaskRunPeriod.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: Specifies the run period of the Sales Force task in hours.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SecurityToken
LocaleResource.Value: Security Token

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.SecurityToken.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The security token used to append to the user name in order to access the Sales Force API. The security token can be generated by logging into Sales Force and going to Setup -> Personal Setup -> My Personal Information -> Reset My Security Token.

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.UserName
LocaleResource.Value: User Name

LocaleResource.Name: SevenSpikes.NopSalesForce.Admin.SalesForceSettings.UserName.Hint
LocaleResource.Value: The user name for Sales Force. This is usually the email with which the user logs in Sales Force.
